xmlText.p: First Period_1, Vegas, Bellemare 5 (Tuch, Carrier), 2:55. 2, Vegas, Miller 6 (Perron, Haula), 12:20 (pp). 3, Vegas, Marchessault 17 (Karlsson, McNabb), 12:59. 4, Carolina, Slavin 4 (Williams, Skinner), 19:15 (pp).
